title: Civil Litigation Management Manual, text (2002)
abstract:
CIVIL LITIGATION
MANAGEMENT MANUAL
The Judicial Conference of the United States
Committee on
Court Administration and Case Management
2001
This manual is for the guidance of judges. It is not intended to be relied upon as
authority, and it creates no rights or duties.
iii
COMMITTEE ON COURT ADMINISTRATION AND CASE MANAGEMENT
of the
JUDICIAL CONFERENCE OF THE UNITED STATES
HONORABLE JOHN W. LUNGSTRUM, CHAIR
HONORABLE TOM S. LEE
HONORABLE W. HAROLD ALBRITTON
HONORABLE J. RICHARD LEONARD
HONORABLE
